messages.message:
Hi team - I noticed Agent Mode is no longer available for our Instabase org in MT prod since we just switched over to org flags. Can someone enable that so field teams retain access?

Unfortunately i'm not a site admin in prod so I can't do it. Saw we already got a ping about this today over in <#C08SC9ZPGFQ|>

for future reference, this (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C07AG807813/p1756830478280689?thread_ts=1756420029.215399&cid=C07AG807813) is the process for turning on org-level feature flags

@Anil do you want to try going through this process?
done - got reset I think? during the weekly deploy
I see it now after a refresh :+1:
